# Remove stopwords
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Removes stopwords from all values. Each line in the stopword list contains a stopword. The separator defines a regex that is used for detecting words.

## Parameter

### Stopword list

No description

- Datatype: `resource`
- Default Value: `None`



### Separator

No description

- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `[\s-]+`
